channel.title: Most Aesthetic Outfit/Armour Set
channel.description:
On Runescape there is a wide range of many different armours and outfits players can equip, my question to you is what is the most aesthetic outfit you have seen, post a picture and name the equiped items.
My Armour/Outfit Set (not real runescape):
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uUOZw.png[/img] This is on Matrix's server. It consists of: Dragonbone Platebody, Platelegs, Boots and Gloves. Amulet of Glory (t), Ring of Wealth. Captain's Sword. Flaming Skull (Purple) Max Cape.

item.title: Most Aesthetic Outfit/Armour Set
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Lin:

Back when I played, what made the look for me was a dragon chainbody, dragon platelegs, an obsidian shield, Legends Cape, cooking gauntlets, desert boots, white hair, and nothing on the head. When I play private servers, the same outfit but with a dragon square shield and trimmed prayer cape look great together, with a red partyhat if possible

I use to wear the exact same outfit.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Aesthetic Outfit/Armour Set
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I remember, what was considered to be the god/endgame outfit, blue phat, dragon chain, legs, dragon square shield, fire cape barrows gloves, rune boots, zerker ring(I guess?), and a fury

And whip as weapon

Read full topic

item.title: Most Aesthetic Outfit/Armour Set
item.dc:creator: @united0wnage united0wnage
item.description:
@united0wnage wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:32, topic:455485”]

On a private server (left) since I can’t wear the shit in my bank because I’m not a member (items from my bank are shown on the right).

Items are:
Top hat
Rune cane
Black elegant shirt
Black elegant legs
Cooking gauntlets
Cooking cape(t)
Dragon boots[/quote]
Holy shit i haven’t posted in years… I must say this is what I usually wear. Looks the best IMO.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Aesthetic Outfit/Armour Set
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:25, topic:455485”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=558392.msg4085501#msg4085501 date=1345779654]

[quote author=Classic link=topic=558392.msg4085440#msg4085440 date=1345774876]
i hate aesthetics, what frell said

waste of cash, could be used for getting your skills up
[/quote]Well that 220k won’t get me very far in improving my prayer.
[/quote]you have no idea how truthful that is… like 31 - 50 was 1.2m with frosts[/quote]Well I’m using dragon bones and 220k is only around 23k xp.

Thats kind of depressing when I think of it. Its ~10xp/gp with prayer, and like 2gp/xp bursting for magic
